name: 小說與電影中的數學思維
description: 本課程從數學小說與電影中，探討數學概念如何被呈現，並進一步探討數學概念成為文化的隱喻 (metaphor) 時，數學與文化的互動與影響。
goals: 從數學小說與電影中，探討數學概念如何被呈現
探討數學概念成為文化的隱喻 (metaphor) 時，數學與文化的互動與影響
syllabus:
有意選課者，第一次上課請務必到課堂上聽取選課說明。

In this course we discuss how mathematical concepts are used and presented in fiction and films. We also explore the interactions between mathematics and human cultures when mathematical concepts are turned into metaphores in fiction and films. In this way, we hope to help students understand the nature of mathematical thinking.
